paper.title: Fortune favours the bold? Exploring tournament behavior among Australian superannuation funds
paper.abstract: In this paper we investigate the tournament induced risk-shifting behavior of Australian multi-sector growth funds. We apply a regression-based methodology and examine tournaments based on the calendar year and the financial year. In our core analysis we find evidence in favor of Taylor's (J Econ Behav Organ 1455: 1-11, 2003) risk shifting tournament hypothesis for financial year-end tournaments. Apart from the standard tournament hypothesis we also report a range of findings regarding stability; fund age; and fund size. Support for the Taylor hypothesis generally continues across these variations as well.

domain_result.justification: 该论文研究了澳大利亚多部门增长基金的锦标赛诱导风险转移行为，这直接涉及到投资组合管理中的风险调整和绩效评估。
